metadata.name: "Orb in lights shades"
metadata.description:
VR Painting still image
PNG Files
Google Tilt Brush

This piece got the international OPLINE Art Prize on 2019

tatement:
 

Virtual sculptures are produced through Google Tilt Brush and Oculus Rift. It's dealing with the hands' gestures in virtual space and the virtual textures and even keywords. 
Everything is focused on energy and flux. It is also questioning the paradigm of Sculpture with the absence of Earth gravity, new material, and also floating object in space. Everything is possible.

Orbe named here Orb is very old form in western culture symbol during the middle age of power and spirituality. But the sphere is also a very universal and generic from since Art History origin and one of the most meaningful in our Universe consequence of gravitation!

Val√©ry Grancher 2020
